Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'A huge barricade surrounds me as I wander the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce. Nothing from the outside world involves me, as if I am a ghost.'}
{3: 'I somehow stumble upon a residential area. People are outside putting up lanterns and decorations in anticipation for the election. Others gather in discussion over who they want to vote for.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory236.png'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: "Hey! Who do you think'll win the election?"}
{2: 'Teenage Girl', 3: "I think Lord Villier will win. Didn't you see his composure during his previous election speech?"}
{2: 'Teenage Girl', 3: "During his speech, I gazed into his eyes and saw a look of contempt. That's my kind of emperor!"}
{2: 'Teenage Girl', 3: 'A proud and scornful hero.'}
{2: 'Teenage Boy', 3: "...Are you kidding? That's not how you should vote."}
{2: 'Teenage Girl', 3: 'So what! Who do you support then, huh?'}
{3: 'The girl puts her hand on her hip and starts yelling at the boy.'}
{2: 'Teenage Boy', 3: 'The emperor needs to have spirit like Yin. His decision making has saved Kowloong several times over the past few years. Only people like him can achieve greatness.'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: "Is that true? You're not voting for Villier because of what happened at the Kowloong Dojo?"}
{2: 'Teenage Boy', 3: "That was the nail in the coffin. How could someone who breaks a father's hands for no reason be worthy of the crown?"}
{2: 'Teenage Boy', 3: 'And what was Qu doing when it happened? NOTHING!'}
{3: 'Hearing the roadside discussion, Qu has long expected this. But upon turning to leave the city, Qu hears the clear and crisp voice of a woman interrupt the quarrel between the three of them.'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "You've got it all wrong! Lady Qu will be the one to make our lives better!"}
{3: 'Qu is a bit surprised to hear this. A citizen off in the distance spots Qu and salutes her.'}
{2: 'Resident', 3: 'Hey, Lady Qu! W-what brings you here?'}
{3: 'Hearing that, the four people gathering in discussion over the election turn to Qu, quickly close their mouths and salute.'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: 'Lady Qu, when did you get here? W-we were just chatting. Nothing serious...'}
{3: 'Abandoning all attempt at staying hidden, Qu slowly walks over to the girl defending her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Why do you believe in me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I... I don't know."}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'I just feel like you will protect everyone, Lady Qu.'}
{2: 'Teenage Boy', 3: "Uhm, she's just a kid. She doesn't know what she's talking about, my lady."}
{3: 'Just like that, the group of residents disperse and walk away.'}
{3: 'After saying goodbye to the residents, Qu walks over and sits on a bench. The bench still has some residual warmth.'}
{3: "Imaginations of the person who sat here previously flow into Qu's mind. What possessed them to sit here and have a rest?"}
{3: 'Just as Qu is picturing what that person was thinking previously, Villier steps out from a shadow on the path.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: 'How pathetic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "The child doesn't know that we were wearing masks while performing a political drama arranged by others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "But when I saw the girl's smile, she touched my heart in a way I had never felt before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Although I can't say for sure what it is, but I have this vague feeling that I don't want to disappoint the child...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Villier is about to say something when a brisk cry is shot out from afar.'}
{3: 'Looking toward the sound, they see a young woman in white pulling a wooden cart behind her that must have belonged in a museum.'}
{3: 'The cart has a sign on top with "Moyuan\'s Puppets" written casually with a brush.'}
{3: 'Upon seeing Qu, the woman approaches her and takes a seat on the other side of the bench.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Moyuan', 3: "Phew, I'm pooped.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'Think you could fetch me a glass of water?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Moyuan', 3: "Thanks darlin'!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Moyuan nods excitedly as Qu gets up and walks to the vendor to get her a glass of water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'Thank ya, thank ya. You sure are swell.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: "You aren't worried about what people give you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'No, silly. I feel safe here.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'Got that right! My intuition is spot on. For example, I had a hunch that I was going to make a big sale today. Then WHAM! I met a group of travelers and almost sold out just like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'Tour groups are few and far between. We had a nice long chat and they told me a bunch of stories about outside of the KCC.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Did you make these all yourself?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "Sure did! I think I deserve the right to pat myself on the back. You won't find anyone in the entire KCC who makes mecha puppets half as good as me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "After all, it's an art form that's been passed down generation after generation!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu takes a doll from the cart—it is a small peacock. It looks finely polished, with each feather expertly carved.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'You sure are talented.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "Think so? I've been doing it since I was little.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'Yup. My family isn\'t exactly in the best of health. I\'m considered ""one of the healthy—Cough...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Moyuan falls into a coughing fit before she can finish speaking.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "...Huh? You're coughing up blood. Let me call a medic.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "No, no. I'm okay.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Moyuan takes a pill out from a ceramic bottle, swallows it, and tries to catch her breath.'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "Alright, I'm good. Now where was I? Oh, right! I started selling puppets when I was younger to help raise my family.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "They were pretty ugly at first, so there weren't many buyers. They mostly just bought them out of pity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'But as I got better, so did business.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "One day, I'll sell my dolls outside of Kowloong and see the world with my own eyes. Not just listen to others tell me stories.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Moyuan', 3: "Uh-huh! Well, I'm all rested. Time to head back! My siblings are still waitin' for me to cook them up somethin' to eat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Alright, farewell. Wait... Your puppet...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Just as Moyuan turns to leave with her cart, Qu shouts to her urgently.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Moyuan', 3: 'Take it! I owe you for the water!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1902.jpg'}
{3: 'Holding the puppet, Qu looks toward the prosperous capital.'}
{3: 'Cooking fumes waft out of the buildings in the city and dissipate, drawn away by the atmosphere regulator hanging in the sky above.'}
{3: 'On the street, people come and go. Others engage in conversation as the roadside lights begin to light up.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Even though I might not have human emotions, I can still feel them from the people around me.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Maybe I can obtain human sentiments by meeting people like her?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I don't know what the future holds, but now I know what it feels like to have this warm sensation transmitted into my limbs and organs."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I've never felt this before. It's a strange feeling, but not a bad one."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory236.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: 'How unfortunate...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "With symptoms like that, she will succumb to her illness if she doesn't get medical treatment.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "But she likely can't afford the cost of treatment.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Her dreams will be broken.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Kind people living a life of suffering is a sin of humanity.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You may be right, but don't we exist to bring happiness to people?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Hmph, happiness? Does happiness really exist in the world today?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Suddenly, an urgent alarm rings on Villier's terminal. He looks down with a stern expression, but after a few seconds, he slowly smiles."}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Look at this secret message. Yin and his troops have mutinied.', 4: '2'}
